nameModal.chooseNameForFile: Choose a name for the file
nameModal.nameAlreadyExists: A file with that name already exists. Please choose another one or delete it before.

newFileModal.fileNameHelp: No special characters allowed. Must end in .js

splash.editorDesc: Code editor allows you to create and edit actions without leaving botpress studio. It features typings and intelligent code completion. To edit global files and content generated by modules, you need to enable that by editing the code-editor.json configuration file.
splash.rawEditorDesc: The raw file editor has no safeguards and you can easily mess important files. Handle with care! You can edit any file contained in the data folder, create new files and move existing files around.

store.onlySuperAdmins: Only Super Admins can use the raw file editor

store.chooseName: Choose the name of your {type}. No special chars. Use camel case
store.confirmDeleteFile: Are you sure you want to delete the file named {file}?
store.alreadyExists: A file with that name already exists
